name: 808 Drums - Correct Pitch Demo
description: Demonstrates the 808 drum kit playing at correct pitch. The drums now have playableRange limits to prevent extreme pitch-shifting artifacts.

tracks.name: 808 Kick - Bass Foundation
tracks._comment: 808 kick at natural pitch with subtle pitch drops for variation

tracks.name: 808 Snare - Snap
tracks._comment: Classic 808 snare placement with slight pitch up on second hit

tracks.name: 808 Hi-Hat - Closed
tracks._comment: Steady hi-hat pattern at natural pitch

tracks.name: 808 Clap - Layer
tracks._comment: Clap layered with snare for thickness

tracks.name: 808 Kick - Pitched Melodic
tracks._comment: Second 808 kick as a pitched bass element - stays within playable range

listenFor: 808 Kick: Deep, punchy bass without chipmunk artifacts even when pitched
808 Snare: Crisp snap at correct pitch
808 Clap: Full clap sound without distortion
Melodic Kick: Pitched kicks stay musical within the playable range
whyItMatters: The 808 drum machine is iconic in hip-hop and electronic music. Correct pitch reproduction ensures that classic sound is preserved. The playableRange limits prevent extreme pitch-shifting that would destroy the character of these sounds.
